name: StarDredge
description:
Factions in space having a war on who can strip planets for their resources first

Abandoned because:

- It started in flash: it was easy to get beyond the prototype state, but i had to realise that people are not used to right click in flash and the left click movement was just not good enough

- Also it was too much effort to finish a game that only i was interested making and playing (i enjoy it in it's current unfinished form so there was no point finishing it)
